p.s: This report, is about the 18 year old German volunteer Bianca L. who worked in an Education Center for children, located in a slum of Delhi.

She explains that her favorite thing wherewere the children.
The children fill her heart with joy, there wherewere so lovely and accepting and they wanted to know more about her.
She says that the children in India had the most joy of all children she has worked with.
And for her it is remarkable how they have so much pleasure in theretheir life even with the situation they are in.

Everyday she had fun with the children, reading or talking and there wherewere also some frustrating moments, but these days wherewere the best days of her life and the days have her filled with love, patience, hope and many gratitude.
